entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
